org.wicketstuff.pageserializer.common.listener

Interface ISerializationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalyzingSerializationListener, DefaultJavaSerializationValidator, LoggingSerializationListener, ThreadLocalContextSerializationListener

    public interface ISerializationListener
    serialization listener
    Author:
    mosmann

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void after(int position, Object object)
      after an object is written to output, this hook is called if any exception is thrown, then this hook is NOT called
      void before(int position, Object object)
      before an object is written to output, this hook is called
      void begin(Object object)
      called when serialization begins
      void end(Object object, Exception exceptionIfAny)
      called when serialization ends
